titleStmt.title: Væ scandalizantium, or, A treatise of scandalizing wherein the necessity, nature, sorts, and evills of scandalizing, are handled, with resolution of many questions thereto pertaining / preached at Lemster, in Herefordshire by Iohn Tombes ...
titleStmt.author: Tombes, John, 1603?-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leon Lichfield, for Edward Forrest,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
